Articles.Content:
This black ring occurs everytime when I launch rocket or plane.

That black ring conseals everything including esc menu and It disappears when my spacecraft overs about 70km.

 

I use ModuleManager, MechJeb, NavHud and dependencies, AtmoshphereAutopilot.

I'm using laptop  that contains Radeon HD 6370M and i7-2630QM.

 

Is it occurs only me? or someone of you can see this bug? I can't find what is reason of this problem. I hope you can help me.

I found it.

that's from NavHUD and I will go and report that bug right now. hmm.
